title: Do you think Slavic women are very attractive? - Quora

response.answer_text: A lot of them do have typical slavic features that make them very alluring, such as large, almond-shaped and light-coloured eyes, and round-shaped faces. Although this isn’t quite true of Russia, some slavic countries have a high proportions of blond-haired people, which many men consider attractive. Obesity is also much less prevalent in Eastern Europe than in the rest of the Western world and, thirdly, women in these countries tend to dress to the nines and take care of themselves down to the finest details. They are also more traditionally feminine in their demeanour.  The truth is also that in most Eastern European countries, but most notably in Russia and Ukraine, there’s a shortage of men or at the very least of “normal” men that is already apparent in the 20–30 age range. Therefore, there are approximately 8/9 men to 10 women. Go anywhere in Russia, but more particularly in provincial Russia, and you’ll notice that there seem to be simply “more women” around than in Western Europe so that any guy has a better shot at landing an attractive girlfriend than anywhere else.

Was said a lot about genetics that makes Slavic women so attractive. Absolutely, Eastern European women is a great mix of many nations due to rich history and invasions. But as Slavic and beautiful woman as well, I can mention one more reason. It is high self maintenance. Russian and Ukrainian women always take care of their appearance starting from childhood. They learn how to put a make up, to style their hair, to keep clothes proper and to keep a hygiene. It’s part of everyday routine for Slavic women : to take care of their skin - to put creams, to put a make up , to go for sport, to make manicure and pedicure, epilation and to dye their hair. Usually average beautiful woman in Russia and Ukraine does it regularly and she spends from 10 hours per months for this. Its rare to see a greasy hair with grey roots, yellow teeth or shabby manicure on Russian women. But I saw things like that in Paris , capital of fashion and beauty…Well, as a woman I can’t understand it… if Russian woman doesn’t have money for beauty salon manicure, she will does it at home or will keep her nails natural and clean at least… Often being beautiful is just a matter of time/efforts and desire, that western women maybe don’t have…

Slavic girls and women may also be ugly or unattractive but when they’re pretty, it’s partly because: they often have the broad, “Slavic hips”, which makes them particularly femininethat’s combined with the large buttocks and, more often than not, large round breastsat least the Northern Slavic women have plump, sensual lips, round face, fair skinSlavic women have generally been rather emancipated for quite some time – I am thinking about the pan-Slavic Pagan era 1500 years ago – which gives them some special powerlast but not least, they’re more accessible to certain proposals and types of contact which makes it easier for men, including Western men, to uncover the aspects of their beauty that remain hidden in the Western and other women ;-)

This is only my opinion but from the pics on google, Slavic women look just like hot white women. Most white women who eat healthy will look the same, so Yes:  This is very pretty but it’s not ‘the most beautiful’. Those features are plain not stunning like when you see a woman on the street and she’s stunning so you can’t believe she exists. The deviations make a woman stunning as opposed to plain. This is stunning/most beautiful:    But this is the worlds most perfect face:  And this is the image from the beginning:  So yeah I can see why your theory makes sense. But I’m a girl so I don’t find those last 2 women stunning because they’re lacking something amazing that the other pics had. But I don’t know how men think, so this is only my opinion.

I am mostly slavic by blood, however I wouldn’t say they are “the most beautiful” : this is in the eyes of the beholder. I have seen Indian women that, to me, were much more beautiful. Especially the ones with light eyes - green or blue, they’re stunning. I have seen African women that are stunning. They have such perfect features. Japanese women looking almost surreal - so fragile. Beauty is not a standardised concept. I don’t think a certain nation has “the most beautiful women”. Sure, slavic women can be very blonde, tall and slim, if that’s your definition of beauty then you would find them beautiful. But so are most nordic women. If that’s what you have in view, it would probably be hard for you to tell the difference.

Indeed they are—most elegant and graceful—especially the Ukrainian women. They seemed to be on the whole ethereally beautiful and elegant through and through. They have genes passed down from Mongols, Khazars, Asians from centuries back. All women have their own beauty—-for certain and yet when I saw Ukrainian women’s beauty they seem to have this effortless grace—almost like a goddess about them—the way they carry themselves. Very ethereal. Case in point Diana Harkusha—Miss Ukraine 2014. Stunning through and through. She’s a lawyer too.

Most of them don’t find the idea of being pretty as oppressive Patriarchy, maybe that’s why? Or maybe because they admire themselves as women and all that being a woman means? Or maybe they understand that admiring their sexuality and what makes them so attractive is not sexism? Such women like to be desired… and they know they are strong with it because they are not some kind of gutless snowflakes that are empowered to whining about most absurd things imaginable. Men… adore strong women… And women adore men with character. PC is the exact opposite of what relationship of strong people means… and no wonder…. love does not fit in the PC agenda.  Wanna kiss goodbye kissing? … vote left!!!

Diverse genetics is probably the main culprit here - as Slavs were located in the center of Europe for more than a thousand years, they were mix-and-matching with all the other groups through migrations and conquests. Thus, Slavs have one of the widest gene pools, coming from almost every corner of Europe (since the first encounter with Romans, as well as fights and migrations with Germanic people and Nordics), Asia (through Mongolian raids for example) and Middle East (wars with Turkish Empire). And having so many different ancestors equals a huge variety of features in both men and women that are appealing to many other nations.

False premise. There is no such thing as “Slavic women” Slavic is a language classification and nothing more. Your question would make some sense if you asked about “Russian women” or “Eastern European women” which would be based on a real commonality within these groups (ethnicity or common socioeconomic development for half a century in respectively). There is nothing in common between (for example) a Russian, Bulgarian and Croatian woman which is not present, say, in a Hungarian or Romanian woman. Except the language of course.

Large genetic pool. After being intermixed with Germans, Scandinavians, Tatars, Turks and Mongols for several centuries they have large gene pool thus better natural looks.Survival of the fittest. Being constantly harassed by their neighbors and living through harsh environment means only the fittest and smartest usually thrive and after Ww2 that made it even more apparent. I assume attractive women have better odds at surviving a war than say less attractive.

Well, I don't know. Most Slavs are Eurasians. I don't know if that's the attraction, but there are many Slavic countries. I shan't list them all. Poland  Ukraine  I think it's largely your preference. If it's that you love Eurasians, you could go other places too. I would suspect you would probably enjoy living in East Asia or Bangkok-- maybe even Singapore or Kuala Lumpur. Kula Lumpur  Singapore  You'd find a lot of genetic variety and a lot of Eurasian women in the capital cities. 'Nuff Said. www.seveniscompletionshop.com

There are a few reasons. One reason is the striking features commonly found in Slavs such as high cheekbones and cat like eyes. Another is the glamourous and sexy style popular in Russia and Eastern Europe. Women often wear high heels and a full faces of makeup just to go grocery shopping. There is also the theory that because there were many more women than men after WW2, less attractive women remained single and didn't have children because the men chose the most beautiful women. Of course, lifestyle is also a factor, with Slavic women being less likely to be obese compared to Americans.

Because it is culturally expected that a woman will take care of her figure, skin, nails, will put on make-up, maintain good hygine and so on. Beauty is a lot about effort. Any phisically healthy woman, with symetrical features, can be attractive if she puts her mind to it and is willing to suffer a bit for it. Slavic girls tend to exercise, follow a healthy diet, spend money on beauty procedures and take the time to dress up before going out. I can illustrate my point with an anecdote from my short trip to Ireland. The girls there just don’t seem to give a damn about their looks. Like, going-out-unwashed, never-passed-within-2-miles-of-a-gym level. Not to mention they seem to sprey-paint their make up and choose clothes that are, to put it mildly, unflattering on them. Oh and hair removal seems not to be a thing. And before feminists jump at me/Slavic culture for being sexist, that’s demonstrably not the case. In fact it has never really been sexist and that’s one reason why femminism never made any headway. Men face equal pressure to be overly masculine for example.

Basically because they are tall and thin. Another reason is that they pay a lot of attention to their physical appearance because there is a shortage of good men in Eastern Europe. (Good meaning men who respect women, are not alcoholics and have a good paying job. If you don’t believe me - go to Eastern Europe.)
They start with good bone structure.

Part of the reason is the mix of Western and Eastern genes that makes them unforgettable. They are usually very stylish as well, possibly to capture a sense of individuality in a strongly collectivistic country. Superior food sources in the more rural areas may also have something to do with it. But Slavic women in the USA are often carefully selected through family wealth or highly visible professions like modeling and media. American men can attract very beautiful Slavic women who want to live, work, and study in the USA. Not all Slavic women look like this by any means!
I think Slavic beauty is similar like this picture  Earthy and natural. No need for extra make up.

They tend to have a really healthy diet and tend to be slightly more mix than other europeans. Both combinations equal beauty. Beauty however is subjective. North africans and middle-eastern beauty is my preference.
To whom are they most beautiful? Beautiful women come in all races and from all different countries and cultures.

I agree, Polish, Ukrainean, Russian, Czech, Croatian, Slovenian, Serbian…etc. women are all nations in the top 20 countries with the hottest women. I also agree to giving them the top spot because Slavic girls look very good from 18 to 40, but age terribly past that unlike Asian and Black women.

Uglies were weeded out, genges khan only had the most beautiful healthy women around; 2 world wars, starvation and freezing deaths each winter. The best soil on earth for food. Only beautiful women survive.
